description: YO-KAI WATCH is a game about the mysterious, sometimes cute, sometimes spooky and usually mischevious Yo-kai that secretly inhabit our world. They're hiding everywhere! Many of them are causing trouble in people's daily lives, so you need to assemble a team of six Yo-kai and call upon them when you need their help. Every Yo-kai has a unique personality and abilities, so it will take some strategy to form and change your team to address various problems and fight evil Yo-kai!
name: YO-KAI WATCH®
